// The time when the workflow execution was closed. Set only if the execution

WorkflowType.Documentation: // The type of the workflow execution.

OpenChildWorkflowExecutions.Documentation: // The count of child workflow executions whose status is OPEN.

OpenDecisionTasks.Documentation:
// The count of decision tasks whose status is OPEN. A workflow execution can
// have at most one open decision task.

OpenTimers.Documentation:
// The count of timers started by this workflow execution that have not fired

Input.Documentation: // The input provided to the workflow execution (if any).

// The IAM role attached to this workflow execution to use when invoking AWS

ParentWorkflowExecution.Documentation:

TaskList.Documentation:
